skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: euro radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Nanton Community Broadcasting Association encompasses the radio station; euroRADIO. It also publishes the Nanton Business Mini Directory and we produce two weekly FB live (video) shows to promote our communities, the people, the businesses, the service groups and the events that take place.

A hyper focused information and entertainment hub to educate and inform the Nanton residents.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
